Calculate (cohort) outcome proportions

props_by_events.Rd

Calculate (cohort) outcome proportions

Usage

props_by_events(x)

Arguments

x

The count of events of different outcomes

Value

A numeric vector of length \(k + C^{k}_{2}\) where the first k elements are \(p_k\) and the rest are \(p_{k,r}\)

Examples

props_by_events(c(2557, 186, 176, 467, 120))
#> $events
#> [1] 2557  186  176  467  120
#> 
#> $p
#>          1          2          3          4          5        2_1        3_1 
#> 0.72932116 0.05305191 0.05019966 0.13320023 0.03422704 0.78237307 0.77952082 
#>        4_1        5_1        3_2        4_2        5_2        4_3        5_3 
#> 0.86252139 0.76354820 0.10325157 0.18625214 0.08727895 0.18339989 0.08442670 
#>        5_4 
#> 0.16742727 
#>
